Key Match Events: Anthony Volpe hit a go-ahead grand slam off Dodgers reliever Daniel Hudson in the third inning
Austin Wells hit a solo home run in the sixth inning
Gleyber Torres hit a three-run home run in the eighth inning
Juan Soto hit a double in the eighth inning
Aaron Judge hit an RBI single in the eighth inning
Post-Match Reflections: The Yankees avoided being swept in the World Series for the first time since 1976
Manager Aaron Boone highlighted the top blow off Yankee Stadium in a World Series game
Volpe expressed pride in the team's resilience after the comeback win
Miscellaneous Highlights: Freddie Freeman hit a two-run home run in the first inning
Dodgers' relievers preserved their highest-leverage relievers for Game 5
The Yankees stranded two runners in the bottom of the first
